Name: Mud Way
About the game: Mud wants to live, but it has to face a race for survival through several Stages with different characteristics. Combining elements as diverse as adventure, maze, enemy swarm, platforming, run for life, roguelike, exploration, stealth and find the key to advance. With increasing difficulties with each Level, earn new Essences to take a step forward, progressing Stage after Stage in a world that seems to mold itself to you, and face the one that prevents you from living... Collect Mud Bubbles to add more Essences and increase your chance of survival. Some Essences collected: - Combat: Life, Attack and Protection. - Skill: Run, Jump and Ghost. - Maintenance: Recovery, Points and Level Skip. Features: - 19 Stages with different characteristics and 5 derivations of each one of them. - 18 different Essences to improve the character. - 10 different shapes for Mud. - An Enemy who seems to have no interest in you at all.
